about_the_game:
In this game, you will control Alex and Jade, a young couple who have recently moved to a new city called Mason Ridge and decided to host a mutual friend for a while. One day, they receive a package intended for the friend, and upon opening it, discover something unexpected that will change their night in ways they never imagined. The couple's survival will depend on making the right choices.

Gameplay

The game is essentially a first-person narrative walking simulator with exploration and dialogue mechanics.

Key Features

  • Atmospheric environment

  • Retro PSX/PS1 graphics and VHS film aesthetic

  • Receive messages from NPCs

  • Character swapping

Alex, 22 year old, splits his time between working at a gas station and his passion for photography, capturing special moments at private events. Despite his busy schedule, he made the tough decision to postpone his dream of studying culinary arts. Instead, Alex is dedicated to supporting his partner Jade in achieving her dream of becoming a physical therapist. Together, they are experiencing a new phase in their lives: moving out of their parents' homes and finding a place they can call their own.

Jade, 20 years old, is interning at a physical therapy clinic in a neighborhood in Mason Ridge, where she and her partner Alex decided to move to live their relationship more intimately and enjoy moments that were not possible in high school. Despite the internship, Jade spends most of her time at home taking care of household chores and focusing on college, where she is in a lighter period with less calendar pressure.

content_descriptors.notes:
O jogo contém cenas com sangue que podem causar desconforto em algumas pessoas.

The game contains scenes with blood that can cause discomfort in some people.

name: Don't Stop Looking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2500U 2.0Ghz / Intel Core i5 7200U 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 940Mx / AMD Radeon 530
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-7700K 4.5Ghz / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050TI / Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Alex and Jade, a young couple who just arrived in Mason Ridge, decide to host a friend temporarily. One day, they receive a package intended for him and, when they open it, find something unexpected that transforms their night in unimaginable ways.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
